name: VR Home
description: VR Home is a sandbox game made for the HTC Vive based around building and designing your own virtual house or room. You can build, save, customise and interact with your spaces and homes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 980TI DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
